虧.definition: to lose (money); to have a deficit; to be deficient; to treat unfairly; luckily; fortunately; thanks to; (used to introduce an ironic remark about sb who has fallen short of expectations)

虧得.definition: fortunately; luckily; (sarcastic) fancy that, how fortunate!

虧欠.definition: to have a deficit; to be in the red; to owe

虧空.definition: in debt; in the red; in deficit

虧缺.definition: to be lacking; to fall short of; to wane; deficit; deficient

虧負.definition: deficient; to let sb down; to cause sb suffering
